reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of PHYS 11, PHYS 12, PHYS 100. (plus Principles of Mathematics 12.)
Note: Students having completed Physics 12 are also eligible for ASTR 102. If, however, you experience difficulty in registering, please contact the undergraduate programme coordinator at undergrad@phas.ubc.ca.
description: Modern stellar and extragalactic astronomy. Stars and stellar evolution from protostars to black holes; galaxies and quasars; cosmology. ASTR 200/205 rather than ASTR 102 are recommended for students who intend to pursue studies in Astronomy.
